tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are consulting  Dr. Spoorthi mam for my father-in-law who has Type-2 Diabetes. Initially his blood sugar was always high (above 300's) with Mam's guidance we followed the changes prescribed by her in terms of food and medicine, his blood sugar was reduced significantly over the past 2 months. These changes made him more active and improved quality of life, We had multiple follow ups with Spoorthi mam to analyse and devise a custom made meal plan and insulin dosages, we are so grateful we got to consult with her, ** ************* ***** **** **** *** ** **** ****** ** *** *** ** *** **** ** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have visited Dr.Spoorthi (ProMed) few times, Never got disappointed with her friendliness and hospitality.
Being a doctor I have high expectations on other colleagues for better treatment but Dr.Spoorthi is always a step higher than my expectations. She takes her time explaining the medical conditions and treatment given to you , doctor spends time for each and every patient And concerned to answer any doubts regarding your medical condition or drugs prescribed.I can assure you wonâ€™t  be having any doubts when your out from the doctors cabin that feels very relaxing. The point worth mentioning Dr.Spoorthi is a Board certified Doctor in America ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸.My humble opinion one among the best doctors in the country. Thank you Mam for giving us th* **** treatment and patient care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Perfectly formed clinic on the ECR. Kind and efficient administrative team, but best of all an excellent (and rare find in Chennai) General Physican in Dr Spoorthi. Reasonably priced and personalised master health check was excellent.  I have recommended Dr Spoorthi to several friends both expat and Indian and they have all rated her and her staff highly

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Spoorthi is very polite and very good in explaining the risk factory and also excellent in identifying the exact issue on your health and she will won't suggest medicine simply and she will find the root cause for the infection and then only she will provide medicine. 
Understanding the patient worries and explaining properly..worth to get it cured .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr  Spoorthi  treated  me with professionalism and care. I felt that Dr Spoorthi and all the other employees of the promed hospital made me feel that I was in safe hands and even made me smile when I left.   I appreciated her follow-up and willingness to answer questions .A big thank you to Dr Spoorthi and the promed team .

tags: None
review: Dr. Spoorthi 's diagnosis and explanations were very clear and detailed. All the reviews I read about her are true and I would gladly recommend the doctor for her expertise and professionalism.

tags: None
review: **** **** ******* Patiently listens to all the complaints. Ask questions to understand your unique lifestyle that may be creating problems. And then explains her solutions and how she arrived to this conclusions. Highly recommend
